nodes.text: A tech specialist was an individual highly skilled with a wide array of talents related to technology. Tech specialists were usually expert computer users, security breachers, droid repairers, and were able to deactive the most advanced of demolitions.
During Darth Nihilus's Jedi Purge in the aftermath of the Mandalorian Wars, tech specialist Bao-Dur assisted the Jedi Exile during her journeys.
